events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Customer issue classified under refund due to request for money back after receiving wrong item.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the order.
Hello! I’m John from support. I understand you would like a refund for your order. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process your refund?
My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got instead.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated a full refund to your original payment method. You will see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the refund being processed so promptly.
Glad to assist! Your refund process is completed. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund without any issues. We're here if you need anything else.
Since your refund was successfully received and no further concerns were reported, your case has been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
